Literature.Title: Novel antimicrobial cecropins derived from O. curvicornis and D. satanas dung beetles.
Literature.Author: Henao Arias DC, Toro LJ, Téllez Ramírez GA, Osorio-Méndez JF, Rodríguez-Carlos A, Valle J, Marín-Luevano SP, Rivas-Santiago B, Andreu D, Castano Osorio JC

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=496.8 µg/ml,Vero cells:IC50=>500 µg/ml,Human PBMC:IC50=>500 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=>500 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MBC=6.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 105663(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 105663(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-170513(MIC=3.125µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>100µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=>100µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=>100µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis(MIC=>100µg/ml),Human acute monocytic leukemia THP-1(IC50=>500µg/ml),Human colon adenocarcinoma Caco-2(IC50=>500µg/ml)
